ing: 1 pinch dried rosemary, or to taste
1 pinch dried basil, or to taste
des: "Used as a dipping sauce for Italian bread or can used as a cooking oil for veggies, poultry, pork, or seafood. Very adaptable."
ins: Combine the olive oil, garlic, oregano, salt, rosemary, basil, and pepper in a skillet over medium heat; cook until the garlic begins to sizzle, about 5 minutes. Remove immediately from heat.
